attributes.action: make it an offense for radio phone-in guests to ask to "say a few helloes", invariably to people in the same room. This is a slow form of torture for listeners everywhere, and an utter waste of valuable Carbon Footprint better spent on music or items of actual interest.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Quizzes, such as Radio 2's Popmaster, must not be allowed to squander precious electricity on this hopeless and inane activity. Contestants' interminable gas could be put to more useful tasks, while relieving mental stress on the listening public, who are License payers, forever replacing their receivers due to putting their feet through them whenever anyone says, "Can I say a few helloes?"

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
